casebody.data:
Carl EDGEFIELD
v.
AUDUBON NATURE INSTITUTE, INC., Audubon Commission and Scottsdale Insurance Company NO. 2019-C-0638 Supreme Court of Louisiana. June 17, 2019

Denied.

HUGHES, J., would grant for the reasons assigned by Judge Lobrano.

GENOVESE, J., would grant for the reasons assigned by Judge Lobrano.
